pageContext.claim: “99 percent of Nancy Pelosi's time is spent on this. She should worry about lowering the price of drugs, which I've done.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump said this on a day when Pelosi touted a House Democrat bill to lower the cost of prescription drugs. As we have documented elsewhere in this database, Trump frequently overstates a decline in the consumer price index for prescription drugs  -- often falsely suggests this would not have ever happened under Democrats -- when in fact it did.
